item.title: Test Post 1
item.author: dropatuningmetal@gmail.com (Quinton Jasper)
item.description: Experiment Numero 1 The last time I used this hugo theme, I had a problem with new posts not appearing in the Writings headline at the bottom of the page. My hope is that this bug was fixed, or that I actually understand how to use this software now. Update From my testing, it appears that everything is working as expected! Thx hugo ðŸ˜Š
